legal_basis: RAD must independently assess RPD's decisions
New evidence requires justification for non-prior submission
independent_review_by_rad: RAD deferred to RPD on key issues without independent analysis
documentary_evidence: Applicant's explanation for late evidence was deemed unsatisfactory
review_standard: Judicial review application allowed; case remitted to a new RAD panel for reassessment
risk_of_persecution: Applicant claimed refugee protection due to persecution in Ethiopia
decision_outcome: Case returned to RAD for re-evaluation with proper standards applied
